dc_title_s: Warm Springs Hatchery, Russian River Watershed, California, 2002
dc_description_s: This point shapefile shows the location of the Warm Spirings Fish Hatchery located in the Russian River watershed region near Geyserville, California. This layer is the result of querying a larger dataset developed by the California Department of Fish and Game (CDFG). This shapefile is intended to be used for watershed planning and analysis. Circuit Rider Productions and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (2002). Warm Springs Hatchery, Russian River Watershed, California, 2002. Circuit Rider Productions. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/hd701yc1102 Data includes reference information as well as contact information. This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
